attributes.action: Setting the maximum price increase for Energy Companies
attributes.additional_details:
A petition to the government to pass legislation to limit all energy company price increases to the following: -

1) One increase per year
2) Increase must be in-line with inflation
3) Past increases to be taken into account when setting the inital increase once legislation is passed to ensure past increases are equalised to what they should be had the increased in line with inflation
